mapper.select: SELECT t.tic_code, i.info, i.info_agenc, i.info_use, i.tic_pic_in ,i.info_note, i.info_host, i.info_num, i.info_link , p.place, p.place_add, p.place_park, p.place_lat ,p.place_lon, re.ref_rule, re.ref_cau, re.ref_way FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN info i ON t.tic_code = i.tic_code LEFT JOIN place p ON t.tic_code = p.tic_code LEFT JOIN refund_rule re ON t.tic_code = re.tic_code WHERE t.tic_code = #{tic_code}

SELECT DISTINCT t.tic_code, r.rev_point, r.rev_img, r.rev_date, r.rev_cont, m.mem_name FROM review r LEFT JOIN ticket t ON t.tic_code = r.tic_code LEFT JOIN mem m ON m.mem_id = r.mem_id WHERE t.tic_code = #{tic_code}
